property.name: url
property.label: Teams URL
property.description: Incoming Webhook URL for the MS Teams channel

property.name: userName
property.label: Username
property.description: Name that will appear in the notifications

property.name: userIcon
property.label: User icon
property.description: Icon to use in the notifications, it should be a icon emoji

property.name: proxyUrl
property.label: Proxy URL
property.description: Proxy URL to use in format http://username:password@proxyurl:proxyport, leave blank if not required

property.name: server
property.label: Server
property.description: The MS Teams server definition to use

property.name: channel
property.label: Channel
property.description: The target for the notification, use `#` to refer to a channel or direct message (For example, '#testingchannel'

property.name: message
property.label: Message
property.description: The notification message text (Markdown syntax can be used)
